es: He estado estudiando por tres horas

es: A menos que te apures, perderás el autobús

en: Suppose it rains tomorrow, what will we do?
Imagine you had a million dollars
es: Imagina que tuvieras un millón de dólares

en: The project was completed ahead of schedule

en: Not only was she late, but she also forgot her homework
es: No solo llegó tarde, sino que también olvidó su tarea

es: Apenas habíamos llegado cuando empezó a nevar

en: The more you practice, the better you get
es: Cuanto más practiques, mejor te vuelves

en: He denied having broken the vase

en: She admitted that she had made a mistake
es: Ella admitió que había cometido un error

en: The man who was sitting next to me stood up
es: El hombre que estaba sentado a mi lado se levantó

es: Se dice que es muy rico

en: I regret not having studied harder
It's high time you started working on your project

She could have won if she had tried harder
es: Ella podría haber ganado si se hubiera esforzado más

en: They must have been tired after the trip

en: I would have helped you if I had known

en: If she had studied more, she might have passed

en: By next year, I will have finished my studies

en: This problem needs to be solved immediately

en: It is said that he is very intelligent
es: Se dice que él es muy inteligente

en: She was supposed to arrive at 8 o'clock
es: Se suponía que ella debía llegar a las 8 en punto

en: He is believed to have left the country
es: Se cree que él ha dejado el país

en: Although it was raining, we went for a walk
es: Aunque estaba lloviendo, fuimos a dar un paseo

en: In spite of being tired, she kept working
es: A pesar de estar cansada, siguió trabajando

en: He worked hard so that he could buy a car
es: Él trabajó duro para poder comprar un coche

en: As soon as she finished, she went home

en: I will call you as soon as I arrive

es: Prefiero quedarme en casa que salir esta noche

en: He talks as though he had all the answers

en: Only after he left did she realize the truth

en: Rarely have I seen such a beautiful place

en: On no account must this information be shared

en: Not until midnight did they arrive home

en: No sooner had I closed my eyes than I fell asleep
